course_description: This is the marketing strategy seminar in the PhD course sequence at Emory. It is intended to be an introduction to the substantive literature in marketing. You will find that marketing strategy is inherently interdisciplinary and as such, you will be exposed to readings from economics, sociology, psychology, and the organizational sciences in addition to the marketing literature
